TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 中使用类和方法以提供对业务对象实例之前使用的任何数据操作访问控件和业务对象执行。The class is used in the and methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the control and business object are performed. 业务对象设置和使用访问属性。The business object is set and accessed using the property. 通过添加要处理的事件处理程序委托事件，你可以自定义代码而不是在创建业务对象的实例执行实例化。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the performing the instantiation. 这很有用时所需的业务对象，或要调用的非默认构造函数来创建实例; 的非默认实例始终调用默认构造函数来创建适用于的业务对象的实例。This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with. 你还可以添加要处理的事件处理程序委托事件，使您可以公开访问任何公开的业务对象的成员，以执行任何附加初始化或工作。You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work. 和方法不调用的控件，但前提是执行数据操作的业务对象方法`static`。The and methods are not called by the control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`. 控件可公开可以处理在其生命周期的各个时间用于基础业务对象的多个事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出了事件以及关联类和事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|事件处理程序EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

创建业务对象的实例之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

创建业务对象的实例后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

检索的数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

执行插入、 更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

检索的数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |, , ., , .

完成插入、 更新或删除操作后执行。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在业务对象被销毁前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件检索和显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例使用的示例基本业务对象。The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件检索和显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此示例中，如下所示许多实际方案中，可能无法也不需要使用具有的业务对象的默认实例控件。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此示例中，无法成功调用默认构造函数，因为它将引发异常。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情况下，可能会受保护的默认构造函数并在其他它可能不会初始化为所需状态的业务对象。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 无论什么原因，你可以自己创建的业务对象的实例并将实例设置为属性对象传递给处理程序。Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 这是业务对象实例将用于执行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示前面的代码示例使用的示例基本业务对象。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/northwindemployee15.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/northwindemployee15.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表示一个业务对象的对象， 控件使用该业务对象执行数据操作。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the business object with which the control performs data operations.

value.span: 用来执行数据操作的业务对象；如果将 传递给 ，则为 。

span.span: The business object the uses to perform data operations; otherwise, , if is passed to the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件检索和显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例使用的示例基本业务对象。The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件检索和显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此示例中，如下所示许多实际方案中，可能无法也不需要使用具有的业务对象的默认实例控件。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此示例中，无法成功调用默认构造函数，因为它将引发异常。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情况下，可能会受保护的默认构造函数并在其他它可能不会初始化为所需状态的业务对象。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 无论什么原因，你可以自己创建的业务对象的实例并将实例设置为属性对象传递给处理程序。Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 这是业务对象实例将用于执行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示前面的代码示例使用的示例基本业务对象。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/northwindemployee15.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/northwindemployee15.vb#2)]
